rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance with automatic door and low thresholds. Incorporates Vastu principles for entry, ensuring good energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space designed in Scandinavian style with minimalistic furniture and natural light. Adjacent to the entrance hall.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Convertible dining area integrated into the living room for flexibility; includes ample seating arrangements.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Functional Scandinavian kitchen with accessible counters and storage solutions, designed for wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment Section (Bedroom)
rooms.description: Primary living space that doubles as a bedroom, featuring built-in storage and a spacious balcony. Designed per Vastu principles to align with energy flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars, low sinks, and an open layout; includes provisions for future modifications.

openings.description: Automatic door with low threshold for ease of access.
Provides direct access to the balcony, ensuring wheelchair accessibility.
Large windows placed according to Vastu principles for maximum natural light and ventilation.

garage.description: Attached two-car garage with automatic door system, designed to ensure easy maneuverability for wheelchair users.

balconies.description: Spacious balcony providing outdoor access and natural light, with a ramped design for wheelchair accessibility.

vastu_considerations.description: The main entrance is oriented towards the north to invite positive energy.
Windows and balcony placements are designed according to Vastu for optimum sunlight exposure.
